subject: Webhook notifications not arriving
description: We set up webhooks to our endpoint https://mystore.com/webhooks but haven't received any order notifications since yesterday. Orders are being placed but no webhook events come through. We verified the endpoint is up.

subject: API rate limit exceeded during peak hours
description: Getting 429 errors when syncing products during our sale events. We're making about 500 requests per minute. Documentation says our tier allows 1000/min but we're getting blocked.

subject: Checkout page shows wrong currency
description: After migration, our checkout page displays prices in USD instead of EUR. We set the default currency to EUR in the dashboard but it's not reflecting on the storefront.

subject: Product images not syncing
description: Uploaded 50 new product images via the API but they're not showing up on the product pages. The API returned success for all uploads. Using the media-upload endpoint.

subject: Can't connect payment gateway after migration
description: Stripe integration stopped working. Getting 'Invalid API key' error even though we've re-entered the credentials multiple times. Worked fine before the migration.

subject: Order status webhooks delayed
description: Following up on TKT-001. Some webhooks started coming through but they're delayed by 2-3 hours. Need them in real-time for our fulfillment system.

subject: Inventory count mismatch
description: Physical inventory shows 150 units but platform shows 145. Happened after bulk update via CSV import. Need to fix before sale starts tomorrow.

subject: OAuth token expires too quickly
description: Our access tokens expire after 1 hour but documentation says 24 hours. Breaking our background sync jobs. Using refresh_token flow correctly.

subject: Discount codes not applying
description: Created a 20% discount code 'SAVE20' but customers report it's not working at checkout. Code shows as active in dashboard.

subject: Mobile app not receiving push notifications
description: Migrated our mobile app to use the new SDK but push notifications for order updates aren't coming through. APNs and FCM credentials are configured.

subject: Can't create new products via API
description: POST /api/products returns 403 Forbidden. Our API key has 'products:write' scope. Worked last week before updating to new API version.

subject: Bulk product update failing
description: Following up TKT-002. Even after waiting for rate limit reset, bulk updates fail with timeout errors. Files are under 1MB as per docs.

subject: Shipping rates not calculating correctly
description: International shipping rates showing as domestic rates. We use calculated rates based on weight. Shipping zones look correct in settings.

subject: Tax calculations wrong for EU
description: VAT is being added on top of prices instead of included. We're set to 'Prices include tax' but checkout adds VAT again for EU customers.

subject: Order emails going to spam
description: Customers say order confirmation emails are landing in spam folder. We added SPF and DKIM records as instructed but still having issues.

subject: Third webhook issue this week
description: Webhooks completely stopped again. This is becoming a pattern - works for a day then stops. Using the same configuration that worked before.

subject: Analytics data not populating
description: Dashboard shows 0 sales for the past 3 days but we definitely had orders. Order history shows them but analytics are blank.

subject: Customer login not working
description: Customers migrated from old platform can't log in with their old passwords. Password reset emails not going out either.

subject: Subscription billing not renewing
description: Customer subscriptions due for renewal yesterday didn't process. About 50 affected customers. Using Stripe billing integration.

subject: Search not finding products
description: Product search on storefront returns no results for exact product names. Products are visible when browsing categories though.

subject: Gift cards not being accepted
description: Gift cards issued before migration aren't working. System says 'Invalid code'. We imported the gift card database as instructed.

subject: Multi-currency prices not updating
description: Changed base prices but other currencies still show old converted prices. Auto-conversion should have updated them per our settings.

subject: Fulfillment integration broken
description: ShipStation integration stopped syncing orders. Was working fine until 3 days ago. Nothing changed on our end.

subject: Still can't process payments
description: Following up TKT-005. Tried regenerating Stripe keys and re-adding. Same error. Our Stripe dashboard shows the keys are valid.

subject: Page load times extremely slow
description: Product pages taking 8-10 seconds to load. Started after we added 500 products via CSV import. Images are all optimized.
